cause.description:
Diabetes is the 2nd leading causes of death in Canada. Yes, scientist and doctors are on the edge of finding a cure, but a little money to them will speed it up. I myself am diabetic with juvinile diabetes. Chances are, I can have a kidney failure by the time I have reached 24 years of age, because of my sugar levels. Yes, I understand it's my fault, but just to show you.
I was the unlucky to get juvinile diabetes. To top it off, with type 1. Type 1 is the type where my body can no longer produce insulin. I have to take injections for the rest of my life. There is a type 2, wich means their pancreas' still produce insulin but is using it differently.
Diabetes causes leg loss, strokes, depression, kidney failure, blindness, failure to have an erection, and a serious thyroid disorder. (Thyroids are very important)
Every 30 seconds someone gets diabetes. You might be next in line. Please. Help. Donate. Read. Inform yourself and others about diabetes.
Please help a cause with a matter. With the help of you people on Facebook we are able to help accelerate the process of the cure.
1. Diabetes must be cured
cause.name: TFAD -Teens Fight Against Diabetes-
